ResourceHeader.ResourceName: L. Svalgaard's Interplanetary Sector Boundary Crossing List

RevisionEvent.Note: Updated to SPASE Version 2.5.0 if needed, Added DOI information, JMW

Added MetadataRightsList. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Updated to 2.7.1. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description:
This list of interplanetary sector boundary crossings, 
now spanning 1926-2011, has been compiled by Leif Svalgaard from ground 
magnetometer data and in situ interplanetary magnetic field observations 
Identification of the boundaries is discussed at the "InformationURL" 
given below.  For each crossing, the day of crossing, the direction of 
crossing (+to- or -to+) and the durations (in whole days) of single-polarity 
intervals on either side of the crossing are given.  As of early 2012, the 
list was being kept current.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Leif Svalgaard for creating and maintaining this 
event list

InformationURL.Name: SB event list introductory page
InformationURL.Description: Link to Svalgaard and other sector boundary crossing lists

TimeSpan.Note: As of 2/8/2012, last SB crossing was for 1/25/2012
